original: @169b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rdo rje'i rgyas btab pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @169b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rdo rje'i rgyas btab pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, sealed with the vajra.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la dad pa thob pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la dad pa thob pas /
translated: Having attained faith in the noble Avalokiteśvara,

original: tshor bas gzir ba dang / gdon gyis glags btsal ba dang / rkun po dang dgras 'jigs pa'i nus pa'i dbang ba bsrung ba la sogs pa'i don du snying rje chen pos srung skud bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshor bas gzir ba dang / gdon gyis glags btsal ba dang / rkun po dang dgras 'jigs pa'i nus pa'i dbang ba bsrung ba la sogs pa'i don du snying rje chen pos srung skud bcing bar bya'o //
translated: for the sake of protection from the afflictions of feeling, from the seeking of an opportunity by spirits, from the fear of thieves and enemies, and so forth, one should tie the protection thread with great compassion.

original: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // padmo sna tshogs kha dog can //
analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // padmo sna tshogs kha dog can //
translated: The wheel, vajra, jewel, and lotus, various colors,

original: ras dang dar dang bal dang bcas //
analyzed: ras dang dar dang bal dang bcas //
translated: cotton, silk, and wool,

original: padma'i skud pa shin tu @170a * //
analyzed: padma'i skud pa shin tu @170a * //
translated: the thread of the lotus is highly praised.

original: bsngags // gzhon nu gos dmar gos dkar gyon //
analyzed: bsngags // gzhon nu gos dmar gos dkar gyon //
translated: The youth wears red and white garments,

original: rgyan dmar rgyan dkar de bzhin du //
analyzed: rgyan dmar rgyan dkar de bzhin du //
translated: red and white ornaments likewise,

original: cod pan thabs dang shes rab 'dzin //
analyzed: cod pan thabs dang shes rab 'dzin //
translated: the crown holds method and wisdom,

original: rdo rje dril 'dzin g-yas g-yon 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje dril 'dzin g-yas g-yon 'dzin //
translated: holding vajra and bell, right and left.

original: mchod pa kun sngon 'gro ba yis //
analyzed: mchod pa kun sngon 'gro ba yis //
translated: With all offerings as a preliminary,

original: 'dab brgyad padmo bris dbus su //
analyzed: 'dab brgyad padmo bris dbus su //
translated: in the center of an eight-petaled lotus drawn,

original: gnyis kyis srad bu bzhag nas ni //
analyzed: gnyis kyis srad bu bzhag nas ni //
translated: placing the thread with two [people],

original: bgegs bsal gtor ma sngon song sbyar //
analyzed: bgegs bsal gtor ma sngon song sbyar //
translated: Having first offered the obstructor torma,

original: de rjes lhag pa'i lhar bskyed nas //
analyzed: de rjes lhag pa'i lhar bskyed nas //
translated: then, having generated the excellent deity,🔽the lotus and thread-holder of the Lord of the World

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug padmo dang // srad bu bsnams pas dgyes bzhugs la //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug padmo dang // srad bu bsnams pas dgyes bzhugs la //
translated: are pleased,

original: 'od 'phros mdud pa dor bar bya //
analyzed: 'od 'phros mdud pa dor bar bya //
translated: and light radiates, releasing the knots.

original: lus ngag sems gsum bcings pa yi //
analyzed: lus ngag sems gsum bcings pa yi //
translated: The three knots of body, speech, and mind

original: rgya gsum phyag rgya bsam pa ste //
analyzed: rgya gsum phyag rgya bsam pa ste //
translated: are the three seals of thought,

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum sngags gsum rim //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum sngags gsum rim //
translated: the three samadhis, and the three mantras in sequence.

original: slob dpon mi g-yeng la gnas pas //
analyzed: slob dpon mi g-yeng la gnas pas //
translated: The master, abiding without distraction,🔽forms the two vajra fists,

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings dang // sdigs mdzub rdo rje rtse gcig nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings dang // sdigs mdzub rdo rje rtse gcig nyid //
translated: the threatening mudra, and the single vajra point.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: With the nature of body, speech, and mind,

original: 'od phyung rdo rje'i rgyas btab pa'o //🔽aom a'a:hr'i:k'a ya badzra k'a ya kantha h'um /
analyzed: 'od phyung rdo rje'i rgyas btab pa'o // aom a'a:hr'i:k'a ya badzra k'a ya kantha h'um /
translated: light radiates and is sealed with the vajra.🔽Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ kāya vajra kāya kantha hūṃ

original: aom a'a:hr'i:w'aka badzra w'aka kantha h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:w'aka badzra w'aka kantha h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ vāk vajra vāk kantha hūṃ

original: aom a'a:hr'i:tsitta badzra tsatti kantha h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:tsitta badzra tsatti kantha h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ citta vajra citta kantha hūṃ

original: dam tshig srad bu dung dang byi ru gser 'od beed'ura aindra'i mdog gsal ba //
analyzed: dam tshig srad bu dung dang byi ru gser 'od beed'ura aindra'i mdog gsal ba //
translated: The commitment thread is clear with the colors of a conch, coral, golden light, vaidūrya, and the color of indra.

original: rgya gsum 'bar ba'i rdo rje sku gsung thugs dag skal ldan lus ngag yid btab pa //
analyzed: rgya gsum 'bar ba'i rdo rje sku gsung thugs dag skal ldan lus ngag yid btab pa //
translated: The vajra body, speech, and mind blaze with the three con-secrations.

original: slob dpon mthu chen po ta la yi 'phags pa sras mchog snying rjes shin tu non pa'i yid //
analyzed: slob dpon mthu chen po ta la yi 'phags pa sras mchog snying rjes shin tu non pa'i yid //
translated: The master, with a mind well-overcome by the compassion of the noble son of great power,

original: ting 'dzin lcags kyus de nyid bcug la gus pa bzang ldan mgul dang dpung pa bcing ;
analyzed: ting 'dzin lcags kyus de nyid bcug la gus pa bzang ldan mgul dang dpung pa bcing ;
translated: should lead him with the hook of meditative concentration, and bind his neck and arms with the good devotion.

original: / srung skud kyi cho ga rdzogs so//
analyzed: / srung skud kyi cho ga rdzogs so//
translated: The rite of the protection cord is complete.
